thread.title: Barcelona and Manchester City looking to sign Joshua Kimmich but will struggle to prise him away from Bayern Munich
thread.title_full: Barcelona and Manchester City looking to sign Joshua Kimmich but will struggle to prise him away from Bayern Munich

author: arichardson
title: Barcelona and Manchester City looking to sign Joshua Kimmich but will struggle to prise him away from Bayern Munich

organizations.name: manchester united kante keep him away

text:
EFL Kimm-possible Barcelona and Manchester City looking to sign Joshua Kimmich but will struggle to prise him away from Bayern Munich 
Midfielder, 22, is regarded as one of best young midfielders in game and posted picture of Catalans on Instagram Gossip Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments BARCELONA and Manchester City are interested in signing Bayern Munichâ€™s Joshua Kimmich this summer, according to reports in Catalonia. 
The 22-year-old midfielder has been heralded as the future of German footballer after making his breakthrough under Pep Guardiola . 3 Joshua Kimmich is wanted by Barcelona and Manchester City in summer 
Cool on the ball and rarely makes mistakes, Kimmich started off as a defender and is comfortable in both positions. 
Keep up to date with ALL the Barcelona news, gossip and transfers on our club page 
He has been likened to Philipp Lahm . 
Bayern will not let him go easily, and it will be difficult to prise him away from the Allianz Arena. Getty Images Joshua Kimmich is regarded as one of best young footballers on the planet Most read in football Liverpool and Arsenal fear being robbed of Champions League spot by Manchester United and Leicester Ron's Real nemesis Cristiano Ronaldo and a host of Real Madrid stars' futures could be under threat as Monchi comes in CAN'T KEEP CALM AND CARRA ON Hilarious moment Jamie Carragher snaps at Jamie Redknapp for interrupting his expert analysis on Sky Sports Brawl in Brazil Chaos in Brazil as local derby erupts into a mass fight between players and fans out on their own Luke Shaw, Anthony Martial and Bastian Schweinsteiger sent to train on their own at Manchester United Kante Keep Him Away
